price: Ey İman edenler! Allah’tan sakının/takvalı olun, O’na bir (ibadetlerle) vesile arayın ve yolunda cihat edin ki kurtuluşa eresiniz.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱبۡتَغُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡوَسِيلَةَ وَجَٰهِدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wa-ib'taghū ilayhi al-wasīlata wajāhidū fī sabīlihi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
